title: cargo check nightly compiler error

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code Was unable to reproduce, after a `cargo clean` and `cargo check` it stopped crashing. Also only cargo check caused the crash, `cargo clippy` and `cargo run` worked ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.59.0-nightly (b60e32c82 2021-12-30) binary: rustc commit-hash: b60e32c82864d841e87359333af1e6d1f9cff9ee commit-date: 2021-12-30 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.59.0-nightly LLVM version: 13.0.0 ``` ### Error output ``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'attempted to read from stolen value: rustc_middle::mir::Body', compiler/rustc_mir_transform/src/check_unsafety.rs:446:36 ```
Backtrace

``` stack backtrace: 0: rust_begin_unwind at /rustc/b60e32c82864d841e87359333af1e6d1f9cff9ee/library/std/src/panicking.rs:498:5 1: core::panicking::panic_fmt at /rustc/b60e32c82864d841e87359333af1e6d1f9cff9ee/library/core/src/panicking.rs:107:14 2: rustc_mir_transform::check_unsafety::unsafety_check_result 3: >::call_once 4: ::with_deps::::{closure#0}, &rustc_middle::mir::query::UnsafetyCheckResult> 5: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_load_from_disk_and_cache_in_memory:: 6: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_execute_query::> 7: ::unsafety_check_result 8: rustc_mir_transform::check_unsafety::unsafety_check_result 9: >::call_once 10: >::with_task:: 11: rustc_data_structures::stack::ensure_sufficient_stack::<(&rustc_middle::mir::query::UnsafetyCheckResult, rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepNodeIndex), rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::execute_job::{closure#3}> 12: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_execute_query::> 13: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::force_query:: 14: rustc_query_impl::query_callbacks::unsafety_check_result::force_from_dep_node 15: ::try_force_from_dep_node 16: >::try_mark_previous_green:: 17: >::try_mark_previous_green:: 18: >::try_mark_previous_green:: 19: >::try_mark_previous_green:: 20: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::ensure_must_run:: 21: ::mir_borrowck 22: ::time::<(), rustc_interface::passes::analysis::{closure#2}> 23: rustc_interface::passes::analysis 24: >::with_task::> 25: rustc_data_structures::stack::ensure_sufficient_stack::<(core::result::Result<(), rustc_errors::ErrorReported>, rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepNodeIndex), rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::execute_job>::{closure#3}> 26: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_execute_query::>> 27: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query:: 28: ::enter::> 29: ::enter::, rustc_errors::ErrorReported>> 30: rustc_span::with_source_map::, rustc_interface::interface::create_compiler_and_run, rustc_driver::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#1}> 31: rustc_interface::interface::create_compiler_and_run::, rustc_driver::run_compiler::{closure#1}> ```
